metadata.name: Fly Free Airways NFT-Ticket
metadata.description:
We're flying to our next destination!

This NFT by Fly Free Airways represents a unique experience of Exclusive and Experiential Travel.

It represents, for its full value, a first class air ticket for a private flight with Fly Free Airways, to a destination chosen by the NFT holder.

The NFT holder will have the opportunity to personalize the flight experience, choosing the gourmet menu, drinks and on-board entertainment activities as well as ancillary booking services such as Hotels, NCC, Restaurants, etc...

In addition, the NFT holder will have exclusive access to the airport lounge and personalized assistance services, ensuring an unprecedented travel experience.

Other benefits:

- Member of the esclusive Gold Wing Club  
- Personalized Business Platinum Card  
- Exclusive access to high-end programs  
- Travel voucher from the Infovacanze Group

This unique NFT represents not only monetary value, but also an unforgettable experience in the world of luxury travel. The voucher can be used for any flight / complete journey by redeeming its purchase value with respect to the total cost of the flight / journey itself.

In the event of a secondary sale, in addition to ownership of the artwork, only secondary services remain active such as access to the GOLD WING Exclusive Club, Infovacanze Group Vouchers and the Business Platinum Card.

To redeem the Voucher contact 333.3008006 or write to info@flyfreeairways.it
